entry.title: Operation Red Hot
entry.summary:
Author: forestofsprites

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,041Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Bruce needs Superman angry.Five years ago, this wouldn’t have been a problem. But somewhere in the intermediary years they’ve grown something of a … rapport. Kal’s gotten less flighty, Batman’s critiques have become an expected and endearing quirk, and their post-battle arguments have ebbed from claws and teeth into something more like a post-battle eyeroll and knowing grin. Some would call this growth - a foray into friendship the likes of which Bruce Wayne has scarcely known - but, 235 days, 3 hours, and 22 minutes since their last blowout argument and Bruce is a veritable fish out of water. Your regular boat unmoored. He needs a fix. And so, operation Red Hot is born.Or: welcome to Bruce Wayne's 3-point guide to righting a perfectly normal relationship.
